topics.name: topics
topics.description: Topics to subscribe to, multiple can be defined with comma. Wildcard characters are supported (+ - for single level and # - for multi level). By default all subscription used QoS=0. To set a different QoS, write the QoS desired after the topic preceded by a colom. For Example: topicA:1,topicB:2
topics.ai_hint: Topics to subscribe to, multiple can be defined with comma. Wildcard characters are supported (+ - for single level and # - for multi level). By default all subscription used QoS=0. To set a different QoS, write the QoS desired after the topic preceded by a colom. For Example: topicA:1,topicB:2

options.name: options
jsonParseBody
options.description: Whether to try parse the message to an object

options.name: onlyMessage
options.description: Whether to return only the message property

options.name: parallelProcessing
options.description: Whether to process messages in parallel or by keeping the message in order

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。
